title: Was it philosophy that created the scientific method? How is the usefulness of the scientific method determined? - Quora

response.answer_text: By its results. It’s tangible, accurate, and predictive results. If science did not provide accurate predictions and explanations, then your smart phone would not work. The internet would not exist to have your question presented to a global audience. Your car would not run. You would likely already be dead from disease or injury. That is how you determine the usefulness of the scientific method.
